functionDecorators.name: exitIncentiveSystem
functionDecorators.description: Exit the Hydro incentive system. For relayers that choose to opt-out, the Hydro Protocol effective becomes a tokenless protocol.

functionDecorators.name: getDiscountedRate
functionDecorators.description: Calculate and return the rate at which fees will be charged for an address. The discounted rate depends on how much HOT token is owned by the user. Values returned will be a percentage used to calculate how much of the fee is paid, so a return value of 100 means there is 0 discount, and a return value of 70 means a 30% rate reduction. * The discountConfig is defined as such: ╔═══════════════════╤════════════════════════════════════════════╗ ║ │ length(bytes) desc ║ ╟───────────────────┼────────────────────────────────────────────╢ ║ count │ 1 the count of configs ║ ║ maxDiscountedRate │ 1 the max discounted rate ║ ║ config │ 5 each ║ ╚═══════════════════╧════════════════════════════════════════════╝ * The default discount structure as defined in code would give the following result: * Fee discount table ╔════════════════════╤══════════╗ ║ HOT BALANCE │ DISCOUNT ║ ╠════════════════════╪══════════╣ ║ 0 <= x < 10000 │ 0% ║ ╟────────────────────┼──────────╢ ║ 10000 <= x < 20000 │ 10% ║ ╟────────────────────┼──────────╢ ║ 20000 <= x < 30000 │ 20% ║ ╟────────────────────┼──────────╢ ║ 30000 <= x < 40000 │ 30% ║ ╟────────────────────┼──────────╢ ║ 40000 <= x │ 40% ║ ╚════════════════════╧══════════╝ * Breaking down the bytes of 0x043c000027106400004e205a000075305000009c404600000000000000000000 * 0x 04 3c 0000271064 00004e205a 0000753050 00009c4046 0000000000 0000000000; ~~ ~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ ~~~~~~~~~~ | | | | | | | | count maxDiscountedRate 1 2 3 4 5 6 * The first config breaks down as follows: 00002710 64 ~~~~~~~~ ~~ | | bar rate * Meaning if a user has less than 10000 (0x00002710) HOT, they will pay 100%(0x64) of the standard fee.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The user address to calculate a fee discount for.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrder
functionDecorators.description: Cancels an order, preventing it from being matched. In practice, matching mode relayers will generally handle cancellation off chain by removing the order from their system, however if the trader wants to ensure the order never goes through, or they no longer trust the relayer, this function may be called to block it from ever matching at the contract level. * Emits a Cancel event on success.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
